com.cmput301w15t15.travelclaimsapp

Class ClaimListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w15t15.travelclaimsapp.ClaimListController

  • public class ClaimListController
extends Object
    Singleton class used for getting static application ClaimList and adding claims to ClaimList

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClaimListController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addClaim(Claim claim)
      Uses ClaimList.addClaim to add claim with listeners to claimList.
      static void addDestination(Destination dest, Claim claim)
      Adds a destination to a claim
      static void addTag(Claim claim, Tag tag)
      Adds a tag to a given claim
      static ClaimList getClaimList()
      Returns the global application claimList If claimList is null it will load the claimList from the android file system and returns claimList
      static ArrayList<Claim> getFilteredClaimList(String filterString)
      Returns the current ClaimList filtered as a ArrayList Takes a string containing comma separated search words and returns a ArrayList of the claims that contain all search terms
      static ArrayList<Tag> getTagList()
      Returns a ArrayList containing all unique tags in claimlist Searches through each claim in singleton claimlist and returns list of unique tags.
      static boolean incompleteFields(Claim claim)
      Looks for incomplete field in a claim.
      static void initClaimListController()
      Load the claimList from the android file system
      static void removeAllClaims()
      Sets the application ClaimList to new empty ClaimList
      static void removeClaim(Claim claim)
      Uses ClaimList.removeClaim to remove a claim from claimList.
      static void removeDestination(Destination dest, Claim claim)
      Deletes a destination from a claim
      static void removeTag(Claim claim, Tag tag)
      Removes a Tag from a given Claim
      static void resetClaimListController()
      Resets Singleton of ClaimListController
      static void save()
      Saves claimlist to file using FileManager class

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initClaimListController

        public static void initClaimListController()
        Load the claimList from the android file system

      • getClaimList

        public static ClaimList getClaimList()
        Returns the global application claimList If claimList is null it will load the claimList from the android file system and returns claimList
        Returns:
        the application claimList

      • getTagList

        public static ArrayList<Tag> getTagList()
        Returns a ArrayList containing all unique tags in claimlist Searches through each claim in singleton claimlist and returns list of unique tags.
        Returns:
        all unique tags in the singleton claimlist

      • addClaim

        public static void addClaim(Claim claim)
        Uses ClaimList.addClaim to add claim with listeners to claimList.
        Parameters:
        claim - claim to be added to claimlist
        Throws:
        IOException

      • removeClaim

        public static void removeClaim(Claim claim)
        Uses ClaimList.removeClaim to remove a claim from claimList.
        Parameters:
        claim - claim to be removed from claimlist

        Sets the application ClaimList to new empty ClaimList

      • getFilteredClaimList

        public static ArrayList<Claim> getFilteredClaimList(String filterString)
        Returns the current ClaimList filtered as a ArrayList Takes a string containing comma separated search words and returns a ArrayList of the claims that contain all search terms
        Parameters:
        filterString - string to filter claimlist with
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing claims that match filter

      • resetClaimListController

        public static void resetClaimListController()
